channel.title: ★★☆ RSC server status page
channel.description:
I made a server status page that advises players of what servers are currently up. This way they are instantly notified whether their favorite server is up without having to log in every 5 minutes.
I posted in this section for any people actually interested in classic but un-aware of its presence. Also in case you haven't check the classic section lately.
www.3hit.net/status
Enjoy!

item.title: ★★☆ RSC server status page
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

If you look there’s RS2 status page discussion, so I figured to have them both in the one section.

Read full topic
